mapper.select:
select B.lname, B.lcode, B.subject, C.client_id, C.name, to_char(B.r_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') r_date from CLIENT C join (select R.client_id, R.lcode, A.lname, R.subject, R.contents, R.r_date from REVIEW R join (select lcode, lname from LESSON where TEACHER_NAME = #{tn_list} ) A on A.lcode = R.lcode
where R.r_date between TO_DATE(#{fromDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and TO_DATE(#{toDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 0.99999
) B on B.client_id = C.client_id
order by B.r_date desc
select teacher_name from teacher where client_id=#{value} and status='Y'

select L.lname, A.* from lesson L join (select R.lcode, R.client_id, R.subject, R.contents, R.r_date, C.name from review R join client C on C.client_id = R.client_id
where R.client_id = #{clientId} and R.lcode = #{lcode} ) A
on A.lcode = L.lcode
